cnbc.summary: Oracle said total remaining performance obligations jumped 359% from a year earlier, indicating big growth prospects.

cnbc.summary: A federal appeals court recently ruled that many of President Donald Trump's wide-ranging tariffs in imports from most countries are illegal.

cnbc.title: Trump signs memo to crack down on direct-to-consumer pharma ads
cnbc.summary: The Trump administration plans to ensure transparency and accuracy in drug ads, including by increasing the amount of information related to any product risks.

cnbc.summary: The future of President Donald Trump's tariffs is uncertain after the Supreme Court agreed to consider their legality on an expedited basis Tuesday.

cnbc.title: Potential Trump tariff refund bill could top $1 trillion as Supreme Court fight looms

cnbc.title: AI tech talent is juicing these real estate markets
cnbc.summary: The in-migration of tech talent has a sizable impact on residential real estate, according to CBRE. Apartment rents have increased in all of the top AI tech markets.
